import React, { useCallback, useContext, useRef, useState } from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../Assets/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../Assets/cart_icon.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext' import nav_dropdown from '../Assets/dropdown-icon.png' const Navbar = () => { const [menu, setMenu] = useState("Shop"); const {getTotalCartItems} = useContext(ShopContext); const menuRef = useRef(); const dropdown_toggle = ()=>{ menuRef.current } return (
  • {setMenu("Shop")}}>Shop{menu === "Shop"?
    : <>}
  • {setMenu("Mens")}}>Mens{menu === "Mens"?
    : <>}
  • {setMenu("Womens")}}>Womens{menu === "Womens"?
    : <>}
  • {setMenu("Kids")}}>Kids{menu === "Kids"?
    : <>}
{getTotalCartItems()}
) } export default Navbar
